issue.title: [C++] [Dataset] The CSV file format currently always disables multithreading
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13387](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13387). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Previously the streaming CSV reader was a no-op and so it was a non-issue.  However, now that there is a parallel CSV reader it should be re-enabled.

 

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/81ff679c47754692224f655dab32cc0936bb5f55/cpp/src/arrow/dataset/file_csv.cc#L118
